wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Harold Hall (1 June 1941 – 2 November 2009) was an English cricketer. He was born in Colne, Lancashire. During his career, he played for Somerset County Cricket Club, and made a total of 48 first-class appearances for the county.

response: Geoff Hall (1941–2009) played Cricket for Somerset
